### Apple Inc: Cupertino, CA - Analytics Dev-Ops Engineer - (Sorry no remote!!) Relocation offered.

We're building a real-time Big Data analytics system from the ground up for scale and speed and need a rock-soild Montgomery Scott to have our backs. Here are some of the interesing technolgies involved.

  * Zookeeper
  * Hbase, HDFS
  * Storm
  * Linux
  * Ruby
  * Puppet/Chef
  * Git
  * Nagios/Splunk
Please contact us at hnjobsrtc@gmail.com providing a resume, explaining why you are interested, and why you think you'd be a good fit.
